verses.verse: (A Psalm.) O <S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song,<s%> For He has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> <S%H6381>things,<s%> His <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> have <S%H3467>gained<s%> the <S%H3467>victory<s%> for Him.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3045>made<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> His <S%H3444>salvation;<s%> He has <S%H1540>revealed<s%> His <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

He has <S%H2142>remembered<s%> His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and His <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H7321>Shout<s%> <S%H7321>joyfully<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H6476>Break<s%> <S%H6476>forth<s%> and <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> and <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises.<s%>
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with the <S%H3658>lyre;<s%> With the <S%H3658>lyre<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H2172>melody.<s%>
With <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>horn<s%> <S%H7321>Shout<s%> <S%H7321>joyfully<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> it <S%H4393>contains,<s%> The <S%H8398>world<s%> and those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it.
Let the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H4222>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands;<s%> Let the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7442>sing<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%>

<S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> for He is <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> And the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H4339>equity.<s%>
